name: OR_IMP_LOANED
description: The OR_IMP_LOANED table contains OR management system implant loan information.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the loan information for the implant.

columns.name: LOANED_DATE
columns.description: The date that the implant was loaned.

columns.name: LOANED_TO
columns.description: Who the implant was loaned to.

columns.name: LOAN_NOTIF_DATE
columns.description: The date the manufacturer was notified of the loan.
